title: Identity this Font
content:
Can anyone tell me what this font is. It’s the script in the jpg.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001031im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture-6_6461.jpg)

 [‹ Lynx web browser](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001031/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42589 "Go to previous forum topic") [ATF ligatures and contextual features ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001031/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42563 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bellographix

comments.content: Looks like House Casual by House Industries.

Yep. [House Casual](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001031/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts) from the Sign Painter Kit by [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001031/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/House%252BIndustries).
